compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application
The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

/Users/bakytdzhumabaev/gh_lms/ghai-lms/s.serviceRawFile:
service: growthhungry-service

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x
  region: us-east-1
  stage: ${opt:stage, 'dev'}
  iam:
    role:
      name: ${self:service}-${opt:stage, self:provider.stage}-role-${opt:region, self:provider.region}
      statements:
        - Effect: Allow
          Action:
            - dynamodb:*
            - s3:*
            - ses:*
          Resource: "*"
  environment:
    NODE_ENV: ${opt:stage, 'dev'}
    CLERK_SECRET_KEY: ${env:CLERK_SECRET_KEY}
    CLERK_PUBLISHABLE_KEY: ${env:CLERK_PUBLISHABLE_KEY}
    STRIPE_SECRET_KEY: ${env:STRIPE_SECRET_KEY}
    S3_BUCKET_NAME: ${self:custom.s3BucketName.${opt:stage, 'dev'}}
    CLOUDFRONT_DOMAIN: ${env:CLOUDFRONT_DOMAIN}
    SMTP_USER: ${env:SMTP_USER}
    SMTP_PASSWORD: ${env:SMTP_PASSWORD}
    API_URL: ${env:API_URL}

custom:
  s3BucketName:
    dev: expertize-bucket-dev
    prod: expertize-bucket-prod
  corsOrigins:
    dev:
      - http://localhost:3000
    prod:
      - https://usefy.com
      - https://www.usefy.com

functions:
  api:
    handler: dist/index.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: /
          method: any
          cors:
            origins: ${self:custom.corsOrigins.${opt:stage, 'dev'}}
            headers:
              - Content-Type
              - Authorization
              - X-Requested-With
              - Accept
            allowCredentials: true
            maxAge: 86400
      - http:
          path: "{proxy+}"
          method: any
          cors:
            origins: ${self:custom.corsOrigins.${opt:stage, 'dev'}}
            headers:
              - Content-Type
              - Authorization
              - X-Requested-With
              - Accept
            allowCredentials: true
            maxAge: 86400
